snippet: The author, most recently, of “Two or Three Things I Forgot to Tell You” and “Black Dahlia & White Rose” admits that she first found Walt Whitman disappointing: “Please don’t send contemptuous e-mails.”
abstract: By the Book interview with author Joyce Carol Oates, whose most recent work is Two or Three Things I Forgot to Tell You; she who notes her initial disappointment in Walt Whitman's poetry.
lead_paragraph: The author, most recently, of “Two or Three Things I Forgot to Tell You” and “Black Dahlia & White Rose” admits that she first found Walt Whitman disappointing: “Please don’t send contemptuous e-mails.”

headline.main: Joyce Carol Oates: By the Book
headline.print_headline: By the Book: Joyce Carol Oates
